home_select_course_hint: Select one of your courses to continue.
home_no_courses_teacher: You have not created any courses yet. Create a new course in the teacher dashboard.
home_no_courses_student: You are not currently enrolled in any courses. Please contact your teacher.
auth_login_with_oidc: Sign in with your school account to continue.
auth_login_username_password: Sign in with username and password
code_input_user_source_description: input() opens a prompt for user input.
code_input_predefined_source_description: input() uses input data from test cases.
code_unsaved_changes_subtitle: You have unsaved changes. Do you really want to continue?
code_input_all_testcases_description: Automatically run all testcases until the first failure.
code_submit_dialog_results_message: All test cases have been executed. Your score is: {result}
code_submit_confirm: Do you want to submit your code? You can submit this exercise as many times as you like.
code_submit_toast_error: An error occurred while submitting your solution. Please try again.
